name: Stitch Rock 2012 Poster
description: Official poster art for 2012 Stitch Rock. Indigo, florescent pink, florescent blue, metallic silver & glow-in-the-dark florescent yellow on white house stock. Limited Edition of 60.

name: A Long Time From Now In A Galaxy Not Far Away...
description:
A Long Time From Now In A Galaxy Not Far Away...  Buck Rogers X Star Wars' Original Theatrical Poster Parody Mashup Art. Hand-printed 18 x 24 4 color Screen Print in Indigo, Metallic Blue, Metallic Silver & Bright Orange on Cougar 100lb White. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

A play on the reason Buck was rushed to the small screen, that being the ridiculous box office power of the Force. This mashup clearly improves upon the original theatrical poster it parodies with the inclusion of the ridiculously attractive Wilma and a giant, shimmering silver metallic inked automatic "Biddi-biddi" inducing take on Twiki.

name: E.K. (Glow In The Dark)
description:
E.K. - Evel Knievel X E.T. The Extra Terrestrial original one-sheet. 18x24 4 color screen print in Indigo, Red, Light Blue and Glow in the Dark on Cougar 100lb White. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60. Printed by Screwball Press

Bones heal, pain is temporary & chicks dig scars...
The only daredevil that ever mattered, Evel goddamn Knievel's cool loomed so large it's firmly seared into the minds of the children of the children of the 70's, at this point. My melding of that epic leaping-profile with the 80's most ubiquitous 2-wheeled, 2-lettered one-sheet topped off with a glow-in-the-dark moon and type, makes for off-the-charts illustrated awesome. Yes, you need one.

name: CHEW BUBBLEGUM
description:
CHEW BUBBLEGUM - They Live X Big League Chew Bubblegum. 18x24 4 color screen print in Indigo, Red, Light Blue and Light Yellow on Cougar 100lb White. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

Arguably the single greatest and most often repeated shit-talking line in all of Cult Cinema history. Here is the Hot Rod with unforgettably shaded eyes-to-see... his famous improvised line takes the form of every 80's Little Leaguer's favorite mock-tobacco candy.

name: Bastard Son of Man
description:
BASTARD SON OF MAN - Lemmy X Son of Man by René Magritte. 12 x 18 3 color screen print in Dark Brown, Metallic Copper & light blue on Cougar 100lb Natural. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

Give toast to the one true God of heavy music with the spirit that runs through his almighty metal veins in this gotta have send-off of René Magritte's famous painting, the Son of Man.

name: Sweet Child O' Man
description:
SWEET CHILD O' MAN - Slash X Son of Man by René Magritte. 12 x 18 3 color screen print in Dark Brown, Metallic Copper & light blue on Cougar 100lb Natural. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

A bottle of Jack is one of those long-standing classic guy things has no shelf life to its cool... even so, the heart 'N' soul of G 'N' R made that damn iconic bottle into a fashion accessory like friggin' Levis or Ray Ban. While our friend Saul may not be able to levitate a bottle in front of his face, you have to appreciate how stylishly he's floated through life on the stuff.

name: Set of both - Bastard Son of Man + Sweet Child O' Man
description:
Set of matching numbered prints of both Bastard Son of Man & Sweet Child O' Man.

I couldn't decide which whiskey rockin' take on Magritte's most-classic Son of Man was cooler and made two versions, so please, be my guest and don't suffer the same hard rock Sophie's Choice as a backer... pre-order BOTH for one low price!

1) BASTARD SON OF MAN - Lemmy X Son of Man by René Magritte. 12 x 18 3 color screen print in Dark Brown, Metallic Copper & light blue on Cougar 100lb Natural. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

Give toast to the one true God of heavy music with the spirit that runs through his almighty metal veins in this gotta have send-off of René Magritte's famous painting, the Son of Man.

2) SWEET CHILD O' MAN - Slash X Son of Man by René Magritte. 12 x 18 3 color screen print in Dark Brown, Metallic Copper & light blue on Cougar 100lb Natural. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

A bottle of Jack is one of those long-standing classic guy things has no shelf life to its cool... even so, the heart 'N' soul of G 'N' R made that damn iconic bottle into a fashion accessory like friggin' Levis or Ray Ban. While our friend Saul may not be able to levitate a bottle in front of his face, you have to appreciate how stylishly he's floated through life on the stuff.

name: STAB
description:
STAB - Horror Icons X Classic Illustrated Magazine Cover 18x24 4 color screen print in Dark Brown, Red, light blue & bright yellow on 100lb Cougar White. First Printing, Limited Edition of 60.

The Americana of my parents' youth is not the Americana of my own. In tribute to illustrations' ultimate past master, I present you with a re-imagining of one of his more iconic works. Featuring a handful of the hellish, often humorous personalities that were front and center in an over-the-top exploration and exploitation of humanity's dark side, known, affectionately, as the Slasher genre.

name: CHEMISTRY STREET - BREAKING BAD/SESAME STREET Parody T-Shirt
description:
Brand-new T-shirt printed in 4 colors on white Next Level T-shirt (limited edition of only 50).

It's over, and we're all BLUE about it. Pay tribute to SUNNY DAYS with the greatest on-screen duo in Television History in this clever play that melds them with the greatest on-screen duo in Children's Television History... bitch!

NOTE: UPGRADED to PRIORITY MAIL from standard first class domestic shipping at no extra cost for all orders by 12/20/2013

name: HEISENBORG - BREAKING BAD/STAR TREK Parody T-Shirt
description:
HEISENBORG • Brand-new T-shirt printed in 4 colors on dark gray Next Level T-shirt (limited edition of only 50).

In the end, the HeisenBORG will assimilate all! Seriously, this show has drawn in more followers into complete lock-step than any synthetic club drug or intergalactic robot hive-mind could ever hope to do. "Say Our Name!" "HeisenBORG" "You're God Damn Right."

NOTE: UPGRADED to PRIORITY MAIL from standard first class domestic shipping at no extra cost for all orders by 12/20/2013

name: The To Do List
description:
The To Do List, Officially Licensed Movie Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns, printed by Screwball Press

Limited Edition of 100 Screen-printed Movie Posters in Indigo, Florescent Pink, Florescent Blue & Florescent Yellow on White on 24x36 white house stock, signed and numbered by the artist.

A teen sex comedy for the fairer sex... High school went by in a flash of over-achievement for Valedictorian Brandy Clark. Not wanting to be the odd-virgin-out as a soon-to-be college co-ed, she got proactive, making a list of things naughty & nice, determined to check each experience off once, sometimes, twice. A cute coming of age romp chock full of silly 90's nostalgia, encapsulated in dayglow cartoon reality by esteemed Cartoonist & Rock Poster Artist, Dave Berns.

The To Do List, written & directed by Maggie Carey, starring: Aubrey (Parks & Recreation) Plaza, Johnny (Jennifer's Body, Scott Pilgrim vs. the World) Simmons, Bill (Saturday Night Live) Hader, Alia (Arrested Development) Shawkat, Sarah (Spanglish) Steele, Rachel Bilson, Christopher (Superbad) Mintz-Plasse, Donald (Community, Childish Gambino) Glover, Scott (Friday Night Lights) Porter, Andy (Saturday Night Live, Hot Rod) Samberg, Connie (Nashville, Friday Night Lights) Britton and Clark (Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., Avengers) Gregg.

name: Designer Drugs Gig Poster - "Hazy Paisley"
description:
Hazy Paisley

Designer Drugs Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in glow-in-the-dark yellow, fluorescent green, fluorescent pink, and purple, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

A sexy girl in eye-melting colors by Dave Berns, what more could you want? Gig Poster for the electronica act Designer Drugs, whose band name is such that artists who have no clue who they are or particular interest in their genre are still inclined to say hell yes to drawing the poster for their July 23, 2011 gig at the Fillmore Miami Beach.

Signed by the artist.

name: Mac Miller Gig Poster - "Smoke Papers Over Swishers"
description:
Smoke Papers Over Swishers

Mac Murphy Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Dark Green, Candy Apple Red, Teal & Flourescent Green on matte white, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

Young Mac Miller, in this homage to his video "Frick Park Market", with a couple of red-eyed furry friends over a fat spliff. Gig Poster created exclusively Mac's SOLD OUT November 20, 2011 show at the Fillmore Miami Beach.

Signed by the artist.

name: Arctic Monkeys Gig Poster - "Dangerous Animals" LAST COPY
description:
ous Animals

Arctic Monkeys Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Light Blue and Metallic Copper on Gloss White, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

In case you were wondering how that surly yeti caught a nasty case of pinkeye... Dave flings all kinds of silliness your way in this cartoony Gig Poster for Arctic Monkeys' October 8, 2011 gig at the Revolution Live in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

Signed by the artist.

name: The Script Gig Poster - "For the First Time"
description:
For the First Time

The Script Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Flourescent Orange, Flourescent Green and white on Chipboard, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

A chance encounter between two soon-to-be lovers whose walks in the park have never been so whimsical... blame the mini dinosaurs more than the flirtation for said whimsy, they make everything fun! Gig Poster for The Script's October 7, 2011 gig at the Fillmore Miami Beach.

Signed by the artist.

name: Matisyahu Gig Poster - "Fire Descends From On High"
description:
Fire Descends From On High

Matisyahu Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Blood Red, Orange and Light Blue on gloss white, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

A richly textured, iconic rendering of a strong young lion of Zion created exclusively for Matisyahu's August 25, 2011 show at the FIllmore Miami Beach.

Signed by the artist.

name: Peter Murphy & She Wants Revenge Gig Poster - "The Hunger"
description:
The Hunger

Peter Murphy Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Flourescent Fuschia & Flourescent Blue on matte white, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

Could this Northhampton belfry leaving vampire bat, about to spit roses in your general direction, in fact, be one Bella Lugosi, necessarily dead in order to assume such a form? Furthermore, for whom or what might such a darkly romantic flying mammalian be so hungry for that he would feel compelled to bring flowers? Gig Poster created exclusively for the Peter Murphy/She Wants Revenge November 10, 2011 show at the Revolution Live in Fort Lauderdale.

Signed by the artist.

name: Bad Brains Gig Poster - "Leaving Babylon"
description:
Leaving Babylon

Bad Brains Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Teal and Red on 22.5" x 25" Yellow Calendered Vinyl.

A proud lion and his pretty young friend ease their way through the wilds in this bold oversized print on heavy vinyl sheets (it's the same stuff used to make school binder covers... such a badass poster surface!) for Bad Brains September 21, 2011 concert at Revolution Live in Fort Lauderdale, FL/

Signed by the artist.

name: Siren's Song - 8x10 Art Print Pin-Up
description:
Siren's Song 
8x10 3-Color (indigo, red & metallic silver) screen print, Edition of 50.
A lovely ginger mermaid lets it flow for your viewing pleasure.

name: Sweet Nothings - 8x10 Art Print Pin-Up
description:
Sweet Nothings
8x10 3-Color (indigo, red & metallic silver) screen print, Edition of 50.
A sexy lil Bettie-lookin' demoness on a shoulder, bending an ear through forked tongue.

name: M.E.T.A.L. Minutia - Metal Mascots x M.U.S.C.L.E. Print Set
description:
M.E.T.A.L. Minutia - Metal Mascots x M.U.S.C.L.E. mashup Art Print Set (of 2) Matching Numbered Editions of 50

$19.99 Edition of 50 8x10 Miniprints in Metallic SIlver, Crimson & Indigo
Illustrated by Dave Berns for Hot Damn Arts, Printed by Nakatomi, Inc.

File this under "The Thing That SHOULD Be"...
A make-believe toy line in the form of a collectible, limited edition silkscreen art print having fun with classic Heavy Metal mascots, mashed up with the classic 80's M.U.S.C.L.E. toy line.

name: Blaze Bot - 8x10 Art Print - Glow in the Dark
description:
Blaze Bot
A stoner take-off on the classic Sorayama robot babe. Our girl is blowing some texturally wonderful lungs-ful of digitized smoke off of that big fat joint she has in her hand. How does one say "Puff, Puff, Give" in 1's & 0's?
Printed in 3 colors (Indigo, Florescent Green & Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow) on 8x10 100# Cougar White. FIrst Printing, Edition of 40.

name: Dame Death  - 8x10 Art Print - Glow in the Dark
description:
Dame Death
As bitchy & angry as she may be, this lovely's still hot enough to take the sting out of an untimely demise. Death never looked so good... unless you're into the waify jailbait goth thing or the whole platinum-haired big-fake-boobied stripper deal, in which cases Neil Gaiman and Brian Pulido have ya covered.
Printed in 3 colors (Indigo, Florescent Green & Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow) on 8x10 100# Cougar White. FIrst Printing, Edition of 40.

name: Girly Girls - 8x10 Art Print - Glow in the Dark
description:
Girly Girls
Mmm, ain't that something? 
A pair of pretty punk rock pincushions pucker-up for some passionate playtime.
Printed in 3 colors (Indigo, Florescent Green & Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow) on 8x10 100# Cougar White. FIrst Printing, Edition of 50.

name: AnonyMs. - 8x10 Art Print - Glow in the Dark
description:
AnonyMs.
The piercing gaze of this pretty protestor is cause enough to rethink your stance on just about anything. 
Printed in 3 colors (Indigo, Florescent Green & Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow) on 8x10 100# Cougar White. FIrst Printing, Edition of 40.

name: Guns N' Roses Gig Poster - Snake Dance - VAULT COPY
description:
VAULT COPY
----------------------------------

Snake Dance - Guns N' Roses Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Violet, Metallic Silver & Florescent Orange on Matte White, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

You know where you are? You're in the Hot Damn store, looking at a badass piece of artwork featuring a lovely ginger in a bit of a complicated scenario with a frisky albino boa constrictor. Gig Poster for Gun's N' Roses' March 5, 2012 gig at the Miami Beach Fillmore.

Signed by the artist.

----------------------------------------------------------
OR
----------------------------------------------------------

Snake Dance Art Print (Originally illustrated for sold out Guns N' Roses Gig Poster) Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Metallic Silver & Florescent Orange on Matte White, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

You know where you are? You're in the Hot Damn store, looking at a badass piece of artwork featuring a lovely ginger in a bit of a complicated scenario with a frisky albino boa constrictor. Created as a Gig Poster for Gun's N' Roses' March 5, 2012 gig at the Miami Beach Fillmore. The damn thing sold out & we had so many requests for them that we had to commission this limited edition art print of the artwork.

Signed by the artist.

name: Sharon Jones & The Dap-Kings Gig Poster "Deal Me In"
description:
Deal Me In!

Sharon Jones & the Dap-Kings Gig Poster illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in four colors on thick gloss white stock, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

Featuring the two sovereigns in a King of Hearts playing card meeting with a possible Wondertwin power activating dap in the center as a fun and distinctive play on the band's title. For Miss Jones' gig at the Fillmore Miami Beach Jackie Gleason Theater in 2011.

name: Honest Money - Ron Paul 2012 Art Print
description:
Hot Damn Arts is proud to offer you renowned Cartoonist and Rock Poster Artist, Dave Berns' over-the-top illustrated endorsement of Ron Paul for President in 2012.

This celebration of our straightest-shooting statesman takes shape as a play on Federal Reserve Notes' ubiquitous aesthetics. The metallic gold and silver inks, his kindly smile and a few of his best rallying cries offset the potential sting of featuring the good doctor in the iconic format of his greatest foe's thoroughly debased instrument of central control. The glow-in-the-dark inks and rock & roll typography are visual exclamation points that help communicate Dr. Paul's message of liberty boldly. This striking, collectible proclamation of support for Ron Paul's inspiring run at the highest office is sure to be treasured by any whose apathy he's cured.

The silkscreened print features a 16" x 20" image area printed in in 4 colors (Deep Green, Metallic Gold, Metallic Silver & Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow) on 18" x 24" Matte White Art Paper printed by the legendary ink slingers at Iron Forge Press. Standard edition of 100 + 25 on Chipboard & 4 on Wood.

name: Reel Big Fish vs. Aquabats Gig Poster "Catch of the Day"
description:
Catch of the Day!

Reel Big Fish vs. Aquabats Gig Poster illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed with Dark Blue, Teal, (metallic) Copper & light blue on thick gloss white stock, imprint size of 12x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

Design features a sexy mermaid blowing into her conch in an art nouveau styled concert poster for ska/punk bands Reel Big Fish & Aquabats January 20th, 2011 gig at Revolution in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

During printing, somehow, the light blue plate was flubbed, leaving a 2 inch wide stripe of nothing down the right-hand side. Rather than scrap the whole run or try to talk up the inherent collectability of misprints, I'm including a "gift" of an archival ink printed version of the same image printed 12x20 on a 17x22 sheet of bright white fine art paper along with each original print sold.

Signed by the artist.

name: CLUTCH Gig Poster 2013 – The Wolfman Kindly Requests
description:
The Wolfman Kindly Requests

Clutch Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (75) Screenprinted Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Florescent Orange & Pearl White on 100# 18x24 French Speckletone Wine Paper.

Gentlemanly lycanthropy at it's finest celebrating Clutch's most recent swing through the Sunshine state and a tip o' the hat to one of many bitchin' tunes off of their latest, greatest. For Clutch at Revolution Live, Fort Lauderdale, FL, May 10, 2013.

Signed by the artist.


Note: Additional Variant Editions photographed below. 
(of 2) Red Mylar (of 3) Hand-Painted French Duro-Tone (of 2) Hand-Painted Wood sheet (of 2) Wine Colored Natural Paper (of 1) Corrugated Cardboard

options.name: Printed on French Paper Co. Wine Speckle-Tone (Standard Editionof 75)
Printed on Red Mylar (Variant Edition of 2)
Printed on Red & Gold Painted Plywood (Variant Edition of 2)
Printed on Red & Gold Painted French Paper Co. Duro-Tone (Variant Edition of 3)
Printed on Wine Colored Natural Paper (Variant Edition of 2)
Printed on Corrugated Cardboard (Variant Edition of 1)

name: A Fiend In Need - 80's Metal X Poker Dogs
description:
Limited edition screen printed art. Mashup of classic Heavy Metal mascots and Dogs Playing Poker by Rock Poster Artist, Dave Berns. \m/ 

Standard Edition of 120 - 5-Color Print on French Berrylicious Pop-tone 

Reign In Blood Edition of 20 - 5-Color Print on French Blue Butcher Dur-o-tone 

Heavy Effin' Metal Edition of 10 - 5-Color Print on French Madiera Beach Muscle-Tone, hand stained with blue & metallic inks

18x24 Screen Print - A Fiend In Need
Signed & Numbered
5-Colors - Dark Gray-Blue, Metallic Silver, Crimson, Yellow & White
150 total copies
    120 Standard Edition on Berrylicious French Pop-tone paper
     20 Variant on Extra Blue French Dur-o-tone Butcher Paper
     10 Variant on White French Muscle-tone Paper Hand-stained with blue & metallic acrylic paints

An Illustrated, Screen Printed Pop Culture Mashup of the bands that played in a loop on my Walkman as a teenager and the 100-and-something-year-old guy-art classic Dogs Playing Poker painting "A Friend In Need". This 5-color parody poster by me, Rock Poster Artist & Cartoonist Extraordinaire, Dave Berns, is an instant guy-art classic in and of itself... especially to fans of Rock & Roll's most beastly era.

name: Hail to the King, Baby! - Elvis X Army of Darkness
description:
A Limited Edition Screen Printed Poster of a Pop Culture mash-up of Elvis & Army of Darkness by Rock Poster Artist, Dave Berns. 

Limited Edition (100) Signed & Numbered Standard Print. 4 Color Silkscreen 16 x 20 image area on 18 x 24 Natural Speckle-tone French brand Paper.

Limited Edition (12) Signed & Numbered Standard Print. 4 Color Silkscreen 16 x 20 image area on 17.5 x 23.5 Chipboard.

name: Tenacious D Gig Poster 2013
description:
Fenix Arisen

Tenacious D Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Screenprinted Gig Poster printed in Purple, Florescent Magenta and Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow ink on matte white paper, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

.

Signed by the artist.

name: Willie Nelson Gig Poster Series 2013
description:
Willie Nelson Gig Poster 2013 Jacksonville
3 color print for Willie Nelson's Sold Out show at Jacksonville's Florida Theatre, Illustrated by Dave Berns for Hot Damn Arts.
Printed in Evergreen, Metallic Silver & Red on White House stock by Iron Forge Press, Edition of 90.
This epic portrait of a no-bullshit Willie is an instant classic... the shimmering metallic silver, bright bandana red & deep green line layer into an exquisite capture of a beloved entertainer... plus there's a big fat joint behind his ear. Ah Willie, we love you, man.

Willie Nelson Gig Poster 2013 Clearwater
3 color print for Willie Nelson's Sold Out (& subsequently cancelled) show at Clearwater FL's Ruth Eckerd Hall, Illustrated by Dave Berns for Hot Damn Arts.
Printed in Navy, Metallic Silver & Red on White House stock by Iron Forge Press, Edition of 90.
This epic portrait of a no-bullshit Willie is an instant classic... the shimmering metallic silver, bright bandana red & powerful indigo line layer into an exquisite capture of a beloved entertainer... plus there's a big fat joint behind his ear. Ah Willie, we love you, man.


Willie Nelson Gig Poster 2013 Melbourne
3 color print for Willie Nelson's Sold Out show at Melbourne's King Center for the Performing Arts, Illustrated by Dave Berns for Hot Damn Arts. 
Printed in Merlot, Metallic Silver & Red on White House stock by Iron Forge Press, Edition of 90.
This epic portrait of a no-bullshit Willie is an instant classic... the shimmering metallic silver, bright bandana red & rich merlot line layer into an exquisite capture of a beloved entertainer... plus there's a big fat joint behind his ear. Ah Willie, we love you, man.

Willie Nelson Gig Poster With Jamey Johnson 2013
4 color print for Willie Nelson's Sold Out (& subsequently cancelled) show at Estero's Germain Arena Illustrated by Dave Berns for Hot Damn Arts.
Printed in Navy, Metallic Silver & Red and Beige on White House stock by Iron Forge Press, Edition of 120.
A jovial pair of cross-generational country music outlaws make their exit from Willie's iconic tour bus into the Florida swamplands, followed by a billowing cloud of, no doubt, wonderfully skunky smoke.

Available as a matching, low-numbered (#6,7,8,9 or 13) set of 4 different Willie Nelson Gig Posters designed by Dave Berns, 3 Willie Solo color variations printed on French Paper Co Fleece White 65# Parch-tone (Lowest numbered 17 of each printed on Parch-tone) &  Willie with Jamey Johnson printed on house white.

Available as a matching numbered set of all 4 Standard issue Gig Posters designed by Dave Berns for the great Willie Nelson.

options.name: Willie Nelson Gig Poster With Jamey Johnson 2013
Matching Numbered set of all 4 on house stock
Matching Low Numbered set of all 4 on French Parch-tone

name: Doug Stanhope Gig Poster 2012
description:
Stay In the Fun Zone

Doug Stanhope Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns for Hot Damn Arts printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Purple and Florescent Orange on House Stock (matte white), imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

Doug Stanhope, funniest fucker out there... what better way to pay tribute to our favorite American Psycho, than by riffing on that movie's ubiquitous poster design? Only in Doug's case, he's going to stab you in the ear with some obnoxiously loud, trippy stuff, like only he can. These posters were the hit a hit at the show, and there's only a precious few of them available from us here. Gig Poster for Doug Stanhope's' August 18, 2012 gig at the Culture Room in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

Signed by the artist.

name: Primus Gig Poster 2012
description:
Primus Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Glow-in-the-dark Florescent Yellow, Florescent Pink, Florescent Green & Gunmetal blue on house stock (matte white), imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

Looking for over-the-top action in face melting colors over Miami? Then get to the Primus show... Gig Poster for Primus' 3D tour stop at the Fillmore Miami Beach, November 10, 2012.

Signed by the artist.

name: Volbeat Gig Poster - "Got Your Ear"
description:
Got Your Ear

Volbeat Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in White, Yellow, Red & Indigo on Chipboard, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

Lead singer Michael Poulsen clearly has a favorite winged whisperer in this Gig Poster for Volbeat's August 5, 2011 gig at the Fillmore Miami Beach.

Signed by the artist.

name: Die Antwoord Gig Poster 2012
description:
Enter the Ninja

Die Antwoord Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Screenprinted Gig Poster printed in Black, Blue, Red & Yellow ink on matte white paper, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

This is Dave Berns, stepping up the game for South Africa's finest... Mashing up the most iconic ninja character from his childhood memories of pop culture with the hugest viral success story in music to date into a dynamic little slice of Die Antwoord merchandising awesomeness. Only 60 printed, they sold out in minutes at the merch booth for the show. Not gonna last long, in the Hot Damn shop, either.

Signed by the artist.

name: CLUTCH Gig Poster "The Mob Goes Wild"
description:
The Mob Goes Wild!

Clutch Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Maryland Flag colors of black, red & gold on thick gloss white stock, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

Hop into a typical Clutch pit, stocked with characters that fans might be familiar with, the Minotaur, Willie Nelson smoking his killer weed, Witchdoctor, Frankenstein, Sleestak, Abraham Lincoln, Jackalope, Droids (R2D2 & C3PO), Grey, Gnome, Yeti, Dragonfly and one giant Kraken tentacle being turned to stone by Medusa's severed head held by Perseus, plus a hot chick throwin' horns up. Fun image created for Clutch's May 25th, 2011 gig with Maylene & the Sons of Disaster and Groundscore at the Culture Room in Fort Lauderdale, FL.

Signed by the artist.

name: PUSCIFER Gig Posters - 2012
description:
Conditions of My Parole

PUSCIFER Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60 total, 30 each of two versions, numbered as one run) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo & bright purple on Matte White, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

Limited Edition (60 total, 30 each of two versions, numbered as one run) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Deep Merlot & Florescent Red on Matte White, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

Sexy & silly, this fun image commemorates the great Maynard James Keenan's humorous rock band, Puscifer's 2012 Tampa gig at the David A. Straz, Jr. Center for the Performing Arts and Miami gig at the Gusman Center for the Performing Arts.

NOTE: This poster's run was split between Miami & Tampa dates, so there are only 30 of each. They've been numbered as one run of 60, but are two separate, incredibly-rare posters.

Signed by the artist.

name: NOFX Gig Poster "Punkrawk Brewster" VAULT COPY
description:
VAULT COPY
--------------------
Punkrawk Brewster!

NOFX Gig Poster published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed with fluorescent inks on heavy stock, imprint size of 16x20 on a 18x23 sheet.

Design features a super-cute all-grown & tatted up punk rock parody of Punky Brewster in eye popping day-glow colors that sear into the viewers brain for NOFX, The Bouncing Souls, Cobra Skulls & Old Man Markley's concert January 28th, 2011 gig at Revolution in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

name: The Kills Gig Poster - Damned If She Do - VAULT COPY
description:
VAULT COPY
-----------------------------------

Damned If She Do

The Kills Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Midnight Blue, Blood Red, Light Blue & Florescent Glow-in-the-dark Yellow on matte white, imprint size of 16×20 on an 18×24 sheet.

From a distance, there's nothing sexier than a crazy woman... though we must admit, this one is pretty fucking hot up close, too! Created for the Kills show at Revolution Live in Fort Lauderdale, Florida in January, 2012.

name: Nashville Pussy Gig Poster - "Here's to Your Destruction"

name: Reverend Horton Heat Gig Poster - "Liquor in the Front"
description:
Liquor in the front

The Reverend Horton Heat Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns published by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Blood Red, Orange and Light Blue on gloss white, imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x23 sheet.

Someone like her, well, let's just say, if you're going to fuck around with it, you'd better not dissapoint. Gig Poster created exclusively for the Reverend Horton Heat's October 20, 2011 show at the Culture Room with Supersuckers and Dan Sartain.

Signed by the artist.

Almost sold out!

name: Henry Rollins Gig Poster
description:
Henry Rollins Gig Poster Illustrated by Dave Berns printed by Iron Forge Press

Limited Edition (60) Silk-screened Gig Poster printed in Indigo, Merlot, Metallic Silver & Cream on house stock (matte white), imprint size of 16x20 on an 18x24 sheet.

An illustrated portrait of the internationally beloved, national treasure who is Henry Rollins. Gig Poster in celebration of Hank's spoken word show at Revolution Live, March 9, 2012 in Fort Lauderdale, Fla.

Signed by the artist.
